112.content:
At a bazaar in a forest village in the Digital World, Agumon was browsing and looking at the various stands and shops. His purpose of being here? Boredom. His partner Tai was away at school at the moment, and decided to come here to pass the time. After MaloMyotismon's defeat, the digimon were able to go back and forth between the Digi and Real world on their own.

After about an hour of navigating through the maze of shops, he came across one stand in particular. It was run by a Tapirmon in a brown robe. He was selling a lot of magic items and stuff like spell books, and the like. However, there was one thing that caught Agumon's attention. It was a board game simply called Modification. There was something about the game that compelled him into getting it. Problem is that he didn't really had any money on him since he didn't plan on buying anything. "If you want the game, you can have it for free since it is my grand opening today, and first customer can get anything for free since you're the first one to stop by here." "Okay, I'll take it!" Agumon replied as he took the board game. The shopkeeper then said to him, "Just to let you know that this board game is really something special, and just be careful alright?" "Um alright." said Agumon, a bit confused on what he meant. He then went back to the real world with board game in tow.

He went to one of the TVs that served as portals to the real world, and transported back to Tai's room. He looked at the alarm clock seeing that it was about 11:30AM, a bit earlier than expected. Gatomon who was sleeping on Kari's bed, awoke to the lizard's arrival. "Hey, what do you got there?" "Oh I got this board game from a magic shop for free! Want to play?" "Well, maybe if we have more people to play with." "I know! I'll invite the other Digimon to come and play!" "Sounds like a plan since there is really nothing to do here, and Tai and the others are going to be busy with after school stuff until late tonight." Then, Agumon made a couple of phone calls to the rest of the original 8 digidestineds' houses, and invited the rest of the digimon to come over. The others came about an hour later, and they all gathered in Tai's room.

Agumon had set it up the game prior to their arrival. The others looked at it, and started to ask questions about it. "So what is it about?" Gomamon said. "What kind of game is Modification anyway? It is quite an unusual name." Tentomon asked. "Well, I don't know. I just got for free, and I thought we could play it since of course, we all have nothing better to do anyway. How about we just start the game anyway?" Everyone agreed to this, and sat in a circle around the board game. Then, a voice came out of nowhere said, "Who will go first?" Everyone was in utter shock, and realized it came form the game itself. The game then asked again, "Who will go first?" Despite still being in awe and shock about this, they all complied and decided about who will start off this weird and mystical game.

Who is the player to be first?
112.title: Digimon

Agumon then volunteered to be the first. "Since I'm the one who planned this, I'll go first." No one didn't object to this. He grabbed the dice, and rolled them and ended up with an 8. Agumon then took a card from the tall deck.

What kind of card was it?
1121.title: Agumon

122.content:
At the Motomiya's residence on a Wednesday morning, Veemon was on Davis's computer in his messy room. He was bored out of his mind due to his partner was at school along with the other digidestined. He continuously clicked away through many sites searching for anything to pique his interest. He finally did found something though. On one site, he saw an banner ad for a board game called Modification. It was for free! For some reason, it lured to him like some kind of enticing force was making him wanting to buy it. He shook his head. It could be a fraud and false product, but that strange feeling came back again. 'Maybe it wouldn't hurt. It is free and if it doesn't come, then at least I don't have to pay for anything.' thought Veemon, leaving skepticism to the wind.

He then clicked on the banner where another window popped up shortly afterward. It asked him about the place of residence, the address, and his name, which he typed in the boxes and pressed enter. Another window popped up saying, "Your product will be at your home within an 30 minutes." "30 minutes? How can that be possible? It isn't like I'm ordering pizza, is it?" Veemon said puzzled about the arrival time of the board game. However, Veemon complied to wait that half an hour to see if it actually will come.

Veemon still played on the computer a bit until he heard the doorbell ringing. It startled him a bit, and he looked at the time: 9:30. It finally came! He got off the computer and dash to the front door. He opened it expecting to see a deliveryman, but to his surprised no one was there except a brown package. He peeked outside looking down at both ends of the balcony hallway, and saw no one. How can this be? How can someone be able to walk that fast to one end and disappear? It puzzled him, but it didn't matter since his board game arrived. He took the package and set it on the kitchen table, opened it, and took the game out of the box. He then set up the game on the living room floor while moving some things to make more space. He thought of doing it in Davis's room, but it was too messy and cramped in there. He didn't want to clean it up at the moment. Of course, Veemon then began to call over the 2nd generation of digimon, hoping they'll agree to play with him. Fortunately, they all had nothing else better to do and agreed to join him.

He waited for about an hour before everyone arrived. Gatomon, Patamon, Hawkmon, Wormmon and Armadillomon settled in, and everyone was eager to play the game as they huddled in the living room floor around the game board. "So what is this game all about?" said Patamon curiously. "I don't know. I just got it today, and thought it'll be fun if we all can try it together." "Well, let's get started shall we?" Hawkmon spoke up. All of them then choose their pieces and set them on the board as well as setting up the deck of cards. Then something unexpected happened. "Who will go first?" a voice came out of nowhere said. Everyone was startled and looked everywhere for the source. Then, the voice spoke up again, "Who will go first?" Everyone then just looked at each other, deciding who would be first.

info.brief_description: The cast of Digimon get their turn to play the game.
info.description:
Like Modification, but with the cast of seasons of 1, 2, and 3 of Digimon of course.

Here some rules:

1. Anything goes or any body modification/transformation is allowed except for vore (unbirthing is an exception), scat and watersports.
2. Sex is allowed, but no gayism/lesbianism.
3. Once an order is established, the players must always continue in that order.
4. If anyone tries to quit, there will be severe consequences.
5. Transformations won't be reversed until the game is finished.
